Search Search Search ﻿ Helena Holmström Olsson Professor helena.holmstrom.olsson@mau.se +46 40 665 73 19 orcid.org/0000-0002-7700-1816 Employed at Faculty of Technology and Society Department of Computer Science and Media Technology Research subject Software Engineering Software Engineering Presentation Helena Holmström Olsson is a professor at the Department of Computer Science and Media Technology at Malmö University. She got her PhD at the University of Gothenburg in 2004, and has since then been active at a number of Swedish and international universities. Her research is conducted in Software Center. Software Center is a collaboration between 16 companies in the embedded systems domain (Ericsson, Volvo Cars, AB Volvo, SAAB, Tetra Pak, Axis Communications, Grundfos, BOSCH, Siemens, Wärtsilä, Qamqom, CEVT, Jeppesen (Boeing), Scania, DEIF and Zenseact) and five Swedish universities (Gothenburg University, Chalmers, Malmö University, Linköping University and Mälardalen University). Her research is conducted within the area of Software Engineering and focuses on AI engineering, data-driven development, software and business ecosystems, business agility and the overall digital transformation of the embedded systems domain. In addition to her research in Software Center, Helena is affiliated with WASP (Wallenberg AI, Autonomous Systems and Software Program) as a senior researcher and supervisor in the area of automated experimentation in large-scale software systems. Also, she is involved in research and supervision of PhD students funded by CHAIR (Chalmers AI Research Centre) with a focus on data management and federated learning. Helena is a member of the Malmö University board and also a member of the faculty board for the Faculty of Technology and Society at Malmö University. Publications 2026 | Article in journal From text to meaning: Semantic interpretation of non-standardized metadata in piping and instrumentation diagrams Vasil Shteriyanov, Rimma Dzhusupova, Jan Bosch, Helena Holmström Olsson 2026 | Conference paper Towards AI-Driven Organizations Jan Bosch, Helena Holmström Olsson 2026 | Conference paper Always Evolving: A Systematic Review on Challenges and Needs to Scale RL & FL on Industrial Embedded Systems Emil Johansson, Jan Bosch, Helena Holmström Olsson 2026 | Conference paper AI for Better UX in Computer-Aided Engineering: Is Academia Catching Up with Industry Demands?
